data.name: IN3
description: Designed and developed Flutter-based SaaS modules, building scalable, reusable component libraries to accelerate feature delivery.
Implemented state management using BLoC and Streams, optimized performance, and ensured responsive cross-platform UI/UX.
Led end-to-end development lifecycle from planning, coding, testing, and UAT to deployment, ensuring compliance and stability.
Delivered reusable SaaS modules and Salesforce dashboards that optimized client operations, contributing to a 30% improvement in service adoption and subscription revenues.

data.name: Ayshei
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify user-centric features and optimize UX.
Engineered secure fintech applications integrating Emirates ID OCR and EFR for customer onboarding, achieving 30% growth in acquisition and transactions.
Led development of ecommerce and retail apps (Ayshei, Dalma Mall) using Flutter with API, indoor navigation, and loyalty modules.
Integrated Mappedin SDK for indoor navigation and designed reusable Flutter UI libraries across projects.
Conducted R&D on AI-driven technologies, improving accessibility through voice-enabled banking features.

data.name: Index Exchange â€” XFI (Fintech, Bank)
description: Engineered a secure and scalable banking app with KYC onboarding using Emirates ID OCR, biometric face recognition (EFR), and seamless payment flows.
Developed core Flutter modules for onboarding, payments, and currency transfers with PCI-aware secure coding practices.
Collaborated with cybersecurity and QA teams to ensure compliance and top-tier security standards.
Delivered reusable Flutter UI components and SDK integrations for fintech reusability across projects.

data.name: Dalma Mall App (Retail)
description: Defined customer-centric features in collaboration with marketing and retail operations.
Integrated Mappedin SDK for precise indoor navigation and loyalty experiences.
Improved customer engagement and retail footfall by 32% through intelligent loyalty and navigation features.
Coordinated feature rollouts and MVP launches across departments ensuring brand alignment.

data.name: EMR Token
description: Built dynamic UIs using Stateless/Stateful Widgets and BLoC architecture.
Integrated secure API communication, local storage, and WebSocket implementations.
Executed CI/CD pipelines (Azure DevOps) to improve release reliability.
Enhanced app reliability by 25% across EMRToken, EmaarOne, and Dashboard apps.

data.name: AWOK.com
description: Revamped the AWOK.com ecommerce mobile app using Flutter and BLoC pattern.
Designed and implemented UI adhering to brand and usability standards.
Integrated Algolia Search for faster product discovery and improved experience.
Managed REST API communication and participated in Agile Scrum sprints via JIRA.

data.name: Askedoo
description: Developed complex iOS Q&A app (Askedoo) ensuring pixel-perfect UI and performance.
Implemented backend integration using Alamofire, Realm, and PromiseKit.
Optimized video streaming and data visualization for smooth interactions.

data.name: Yala Toys
description: Independently developed and launched the Yala Toys ecommerce iOS application.
Used Alamofire for networking and Realm for optimized local storage.
Integrated ObjectMapper and PromiseKit for efficient model mapping.

data.name: KFIC
description: Built secure banking utilities for KFIC Bank with Arabic localization and error handling.
Integrated secure RESTful APIs for financial transactions ensuring compliance.
